data.message: We're open! Come and visit us today until midnight, or this saturday and sunday between 10h and 18h.
S U P E R M A R K E T at firma spotted in De Morgen Magazine past weekend. Come and check out our pretty fine selection of food, fashion and design brands.

From Friday 16th until Sunday, December 18th, you can find SUPERMARKET at Firma, a different view on a designer Christmas market. Perfect timing for those still looking for Christmas presents for friends and family. Or for yourself, of course.

This weekend during supermarket, Cantine will be serving brunch à la carte. These pancakes with fresh fruit will be on the menu! You can reserve your seats online. www.eatatcantine.be/book-supermarket
We have some newbies joining the SUPERMARKET at Firma team. Hurray! :)
